title: Kirchhoff junction - find value of resistor X

content.question: What is the value of the unknown resistance <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"> <mi>X</mi> </math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator R sub 0, and denominator 4" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>
